responsibilities: Executed leadership role in website design projects, working closely with the design team to conceptualize and develop functional web applications with responsive layouts.
Proficient in HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, JavaScript, React JS, Redux Toolkit, Node JS, MongoDB, MySQL, Git, GitHub, and Postman.
Solid understanding of Web Development DSA, responsive design, and REST API design and implementation.
Expertise in using the Express framework for building server-side applications, managing VPS environments, and executing Ubuntu CLI commands.

projects.name: Learning Management System (LMS)

projects.name: React Blog
projects.description: Created the React Blog App using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React JS, showcasing advanced features like Context API, useContext, useNavigate, and useParams.
